title: LoL will not open
body:
Hello.

I have been trying to help a friend with his LoL program on his computer. 

Every time, when we open the program just after the installation, it will show the League of Legends logo, then it will close by itself. A loading bar appears every time we delete the "RADS\projects" folder or reinstalling. No matter what we do, the program will crash after it makes the folders in "RADS\projects" and will not start. The update stage does not appear, only the logo. Also, the program is running in Task Manager. 

He is running Windows 7, 64bit

These folders are all empty:
RADS\projects\downloads 
RADS\projects\solutions
RADS\projects\temp


Many suggestions we have tried below, all of them did not work:

Uninstalled, ran CCleaner, rebooted, downloaded then installed.
Deleted "RADS\projects", reinstalled.
Replaced files in the "RADS\projects" with 3rd party ones. (S_OK and some others)
Replaced the whole "RADS\projects" with my own folders, from my working one at home

Changed DNS > 8.8.8.8 . secondary: 8.8.4.4
Reinstalled Internet Explorer 11
Reinstalled Adobe Air
Installed Net. Framework 3.5 and 4.0
Virus scan: adwcleaner and Rogue Killer
Did a Windows Update
Disabled UAC
Disabled then uninstalled: Antivirus and Firewalls
Reset winsock
No Pando Media Booster

He is running an Admin local account
We tried running it in Windows XP mode etc

I believe we tried other things but can not think of them at the moment. I will make an edit list if I remember anything else.

Please help!

Edit:

Moving the folder to Program Files did not work, as some suggested.

replies.body: Have you tried running it in admin mode?
